Question: Ningbo Ruihua Electronics Plastics Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ningbo Ruihua Electronics Plastics Co.,Ltd.

CES 2024

- Manufacturer of portable rechargeable power stations, air compressors, and other related products
- Specializes in power inverters and battery chargers
- Sino-Sweden Joint-venture Enterprise established in 1994
- Recognized for ISO9002 international quality management system
- Products have CE safe certificates
- Products mainly sold to the U.S., England, Germany, France, Japan, European countries, Australia, South Africa, Canada, Hong Kong, and East-south Asia

Address: 49 Zhennan Road, Ditang Street, Yuyao, Ningbo City, Zhejiang Province, China 315490
Phone: +86 574 62268080
Email: sales@nbruihua.com
Fax: +86 574 64464025
Summary_cn:
宁波瑞华电子塑料有限公司

CES 2024

- 便携式可充电电源、空气压缩机及相关产品的制造商
- 专注于电力逆变器和电池充电器
- 成立于1994年的中瑞合资企业
- 获得ISO9002国际质量管理体系认证
- 产品拥有CE安全证书
- 产品主要销往美国、英国、德国、法国、日本、欧洲国家、澳大利亚、南非、加拿大、香港和东南亚地区
